fixes.name: Term Label USD Formatting
fixes.dax_expression:
SWITCH(
    TRUE(),
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "3 Month" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "EDC1" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "3M Cash" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "EDC2" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "EDC3", 1,
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "EDC5" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "EDC4" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "EDC6", 2,
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "EDC9" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "EDC10" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "EDC8" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "EDC7", 3,
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "EDC13" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "EDC14" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "EDC11" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "EDC12", 4,
    5
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau nested IFs that evaluate TERM_LABEL to a DAX SWITCH(TRUE(), ...) expression. All [TERM_LABEL] references were converted to 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL]. This is a row-level classification based solely on a string column, so it is implemented as a calculated column.
